dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 4279 IH: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to disclose certain information to State controlled substance monitoring programs.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Walorski (for herself and Mrs. Brooks of Indiana) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veteransâ€™ Affairs

form.official-title: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to disclose certain information to State controlled substance monitoring programs.

section.header: Mandatory disclosure of certain veteran information to State controlled substance monitoring programs
section.text: Section 5701(l) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking may and inserting shall.
